text.value: During the party one of the invited has drunk a lot of alcohol and starts insulting your friend's wife in public. What're your actions?
The guests have organized poker without your consent. What're your actions?
One of the politicians has suggested you to sponsor his election campaign. What're your actions?
Mutual help
An assassination attempt has been made on an influential guest. The criminal takes off at once. What're your actions?
Assassination attempt
One of the guests asked you to arrange a private meeting with one of the dancers. What're your actions?
Private meeting
During the fireworks show one of the guests has started having an epileptic seizure. What're your actions?
An ambitious shareholder has decided to buy out your company's stake. What will you answer him?
Company's stake
Suddenly, someone has exclaimed, I'd like to see how you dance! To the suprise, he's supported by the public. What're your actions?
The two drunken guests have laid into eachother. One of 'em takes out a revolver. What're your actions?
Difficult choice
What the fuck is the food?!,says the guest and gets up from behind the table with indignation. What're your actions?
Tasteless food
The singer has forgotten the lyrics during the performance. What're your actions?
Slipped from memory!
During your speech in front of the guests one of the invited feels bad for falling on an expensive vase and breaking it. What're your actions?
You've been invited to play a golf. What will you answer?
Expensive vase
One of invited has decided to play a trick on the waiter by tripping him. The waiter falls down spilling champagne on the ladies. What're your actions?
Bad joke
One of the musician's instruments has broken. Your guests begin to leave the rout. What're your actions?
Musical instrument
Suddenly, one of the guests has suggested to split the collected cash equally. What're your actions?
The guy is something else
One of the guests has asked you for a favor to arrange an evening in honor of his engagement to the governor's daughter. What're your actions?
It turned out that today one of the guests has a birthday. He'll be pleased to hear from you a public congratulation. What're your actions?
The business local tycoon has suggested you to bet on horse race. What're your actions?
You've found out that a cop has got into the rout. What're your actions?
On the look-out
Join and start a chat
Stop it immediately! I can't stand to play poker
Let's go the bets up, ladies and gentlemen!
Accept the offer of the politician
I cannot give you the answer now. Discuss it later, okay?
Politics is a dirty business!
Don't worry! I'll use my connections to help you
I can perform a first aid! Call a doctor, please!
Well, i should get rid of the revolver and evidence
I think i can able to arrange it for you
No way! My home isn't a brothel. Now, i gotta go!
I'm gonna invite everyone out and join
Keep calm! I'll bring him into my house.
Call a doctor and go to the hospital together
Ha ha...look at this. What's wrong with him?
Perhaps, i'll agree. let's set the date for the meeting.
Business before pleasure,â€ as they say
Get lost! It's only my stake!
So, i should invite a lady to the waltz
Umm..Do you know a proverb about a bad workman?
Nooo..I was already dancing the cancan!
Don't do it! You don't want any issues with that, do you?
Take a bullet for the target!
I'm scared! I should get out of here immediately.
I don't care about that!
I apologize for that! Please come back!
Waiter, change the dish immediately!
All right! I know the lyrics i'll help him
Oh, bummer! Let's see the fireworks in the garden, okay?
You've spoiled my evening! Get the fuck outta here!
Break his\her face
Call the scoundrel to meet face-to-face
You never liked that bitch!
I accept the challenge!
Well, i'll refuse. I'm an awful golfer
I won't give you a chance to win!
Perform basic first aid
C'mon...You gotta pay for it, i guess
Omg! It was my favorite vase, you stupid ass!
Tell off the awkward waiter
See the guests out to the ladies' room
That's all right. They got it coming!
Invite all the guests to the garden
Go to the center of the hall and dance the cancan
Good riddance, dumbasses!
I'm not interested!
Call him\her a thief in public
Agree and take away all the money
Agree. Useful relations are important...
Refuse. I'll try makin' a play for the bride
Sure, my friend! I'll do it with great pleasure
Just tell him a joke
Give him dough and pat on the back
Why not? I'm in!
Y'know, i ain't wanna take a chance
Go for broke!
Get him\her drunk and find out the visit purpose
Oh, I'm glad to see you, my friend!
Umm..I should get out of here with my money!
Bad luck!
It's a lucky break!
Money (rout)
Cabaret dancers
